channel.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
channel.description:
None of the mods here give a fuck about what you do to freenode's irc network despite numerous warnings that it'll get you castrated. See for further information: [code]Thiefm's ip host = c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net
Logs of him joining freenode channels with a bot... alex@soyuz:~/.xchat2/xchatlogs$ grep -i 'c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net' *.log ##cooking.log:May 16 17:11:33 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##cooking ##linux.log:May 16 16:54:53 * LeleleLlele (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux ##linux.log:May 16 17:03:18 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux ##linux.log:May 16 17:04:21 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux ##linux.log:May 16 17:05:39 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux ##linux.log:May 16 17:11:17 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux
.. What his bot was doing alex@soyuz:~/.xchat2/xchatlogs$ grep -i '<omg>' *.log ##cooking.log:May 16 17:12:29 <omg> U ALL SUK TEH COK BECUS U SUK LEL ##cooking.log:May 16 17:15:10 <omg> SDFBBBBBBFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF ##linux.log:May 16 17:03:28 <omg> OL! ##linux.log:May 16 17:05:48 <omg> LOL ##linux.log:May 16 17:12:36 <omg> U ALL SUK TEH COK BECUS U SUK LEL Note that this is only logs from the channels I was in.. there potentially could have been many more.[/code]

item.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

How old is this Stork? From what I’ve heard, he hasn’t done it a second time… And I had already given him a 1 day ban for going into channels with a bot etc.

Read full topic

It has been Thiefmn twice now. I’d already spoken to him about this the other day… I gave him a 1 day ban, and then let him come back. I was under the impression that he was over doing that stuff.

Read full topic

I put a huge amount of time into smoothing things over with staff there. =\ And then someone does something stupid and it’s back to square one. Incredible.

item.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:10, topic:98251”][quote author=Stork link=topic=141267.msg1355721#msg1355721 date=1179797811]

The point I was making, is why doesn’t someone around here do their fucking job and ban Thiefm?

If you mean on the forum… Well it’s because someone made a decision that what happens on IRC stays on IRC.

How ever I do agree with you that this complete crap needs to stop right now.

Mopar was fairly adamant that those who didn’t respect freenode rules would be F’ed in the A. Nobody seems to care though.
[/quote]
amazing that you have 32 rep when you post this shit. a member should try to fix it instead of throwing a bitchfit. so please stfu.[/quote]
This forum is utter wank anyway, all the mods are cunts. E.g., mopar is dead, and the whole place goes to shit. Everyone’s on their own personal vendetta (example; me and getting cunts who fuck with freenode banned), nobody gives a fuck about the rules.

Read full topic
item.source: Feel free to fuck with freenode

The point I was making, is why doesn’t someone around here do their fucking job and ban Thiefm?

If you mean on the forum… Well it’s because someone made a decision that what happens on IRC stays on IRC.

How ever I do agree with you that this complete crap needs to stop right now.
[/quote]
Mopar was fairly adamant that those who didn’t respect freenode rules would be F’ed in the A. Nobody seems to care though.[/quote]
amazing that you have 32 rep when you post this shit. a member should try to fix it instead of throwing a bitchfit. so please stfu.

item.source: Feel free to fuck with freenode

item.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Stork,

You came up to me telling me to ban thiefmn. You posted some crap that I couldn’t care about at the time. I get a million people on msn telling me to ban such and such, or remove some post or give someone a warning. Then I check my pm’s, and it’s also filled with the same thing. It’s annoying as fuck, ok.

But then, because I wouldn’t bother banning him(you pasted a bunch of logs that meant nothing to me) you banned me from IRC. Obviously I can get around it easily, but you are abusing powers that you shouldn’t even have(you don’t have CS access iirc…) Well I banned you then, and someone keeps abusing dongs so I had to ban that bot for a bit.

I unbanned you from IRC earlier today anyways, but if you abuse your powers again then you can stay banned on IRC + Forums.

I still don’t really know what thiefmn did, but apparently voiD keeps getting his password. I don’t know the details, but I don’t want to deal with it quite honestly.

Read full topic
item.source: Feel free to fuck with freenode

The point I was making, is why doesn’t someone around here do their fucking job and ban Thiefm?
[/quote]

If you mean on the forum… Well it’s because someone made a decision that what happens on IRC stays on IRC.

How ever I do agree with you that this complete crap needs to stop right now.[/quote]
Mopar was fairly adamant that those who didn’t respect freenode rules would be F’ed in the A. Nobody seems to care though.

Read full topic

item.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

# Non-Geographical Interest Group. Non-geographical interest groups covering a variety of subjects may be on-topic. Please consult a staffer. Public discussion channels which adhere to the freenode channel guidelines are most likely to be considered favorably. With occasional exceptions, game player channels are discouraged under this category.

Read full topic
item.source: Feel free to fuck with freenode

quux said help/dev is the only topic.

http://freenode.net/policy.shtml#ontopic

Read full topic

item.title: Feel free to fuck with freenode
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, “development” is only one part of what Freenode considers on-topic.

GayGeeks, if it is what it sounds like, is an interest group - as are we.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stork wrote:

None of the mods here give a fuck about what you do to freenode’s irc network despite numerous warnings that it’ll get you castrated.
See for further information:

[code]Thiefm’s ip host = c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net

Logs of him joining freenode channels with a bot…
alex@soyuz:~/.xchat2/xchatlogs$ grep -i ‘c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net’ *.log
##cooking.log:May 16 17:11:33 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##cooking
##linux.log:May 16 16:54:53 * LeleleLlele (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux
##linux.log:May 16 17:03:18 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux
##linux.log:May 16 17:04:21 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux
##linux.log:May 16 17:05:39 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux
##linux.log:May 16 17:11:17 * omg (n=PircBot@c-68-44-23-16.hsd1.nj.comcast.net) has joined ##linux

… What his bot was doing
alex@soyuz:~/.xchat2/xchatlogs$ grep -i ‘’ *.log
##cooking.log:May 16 17:12:29 U ALL SUK TEH COK BECUS U SUK LEL

Note that this is only logs from the channels I was in… there potentially could have been many more.[/code]
